snippet: Katina Powell wrote in a book that a former Cardinals director of basketball operations paid her $10,000 for dancers to perform 22 shows from 2010 to 2014 at a dormitory.
lead_paragraph: Katina Powell wrote in a book that a former Cardinals director of basketball operations paid her $10,000 for dancers to perform 22 shows from 2010 to 2014 at a dormitory.

headline.main: Louisville Campus Police Reviewing Escort Allegations
headline.print_headline: Richmond Joins Mullin at St. John’s
